commandFormatting.description: The format of the command is: banitem "itemshortname" "COMMAND". You can chain command by adding additional commands within quotes of the third part of the command.

commands.name: banitem
commands.description: Completely removes the specified item from the server, making it unobtainable.

commands.name: unbanitem
commands.description: Un-bans an item, returning its spawning and crafting rules to default.

commands.name: banitem NoCrafting
commands.description: Bans the item from being crafted, but it can still spawn and be researched.

commands.name: banitem TechTreeBypass
commands.description: Removes the item from the Tech Tree, but children items can still be researched.

commands.name: banitem TechTreeBlockpath
commands.description: Removes the item and its descendants from the Tech Tree.

commands.name: banitem NoTechTree
commands.description: Removes the item and all items below it from the Tech Tree.

commands.name: banitem ResearchedTableBlocked
commands.description: Blocks the item from being researched at a research table.

commands.name: banitem NoResearch
commands.description: Removes the item's ability to be researched from anywhere.

commands.name: banitem NoItemSpawn
commands.description: Prevents the item from spawning in any container.

commands.name: banitem NoBlueprintSpawn
commands.description: Prevents the blueprint of the item from spawning.

commands.name: banitem NoSpawn
commands.description: Stops both the item and its blueprints from spawning.
